reviewText: For those of you who are Wagner lovers, the "Ring" series is a basic holding.  Few melodies throughout, but when they come, such as "The Ride of the Walkuries," O Boy! what a treat!  Put aside any bias you  may have against him personally for his racist views and enjoy his music dramas (as he called his operas)  to the full extent possible with several listens  Then add several others to also enjoy.
